alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 5:39PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Tehama and southeastern Shasta Counties through 630 PM PDT... At 539 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Inwood to near Anderson. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redding, Shingletown, Palo Cedro, Anderson, Whitmore, Manzanita Lake, Dairyville, Inwood, Manton, Millville, Viola, Paynes Creek and Cottonwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
